name: Vintage Retro 50s Fabric Baby Girl Shift Dress 12-18 m
description:
A beautiful cotton mix girl's shift dress made from 1950's vintage floralfabric in beautiful blues and pinks. 
Fully lined. 3 vintage mother of pearl shell buttons to rear. Hand-made with love by Heiress Apparent. 

Limited edition of only 1. Age 12-18 months. 


Keep me looking lovely ... handwash or machine wash at 40 degrees. So not bleach. Warm iron. If decorated, iron on reverse. Do not dry clean, Do not tumble dry. Dry inside out to prevent fading where possible.

not sure what size you need, see our size guide ...
12 months - to fit chest 19 3/4 inches / 50 cm. Height 31 1/2 inches 80 cm

all dresses are generously sized and will happily fit children beyond the 18 months stated

...........................................................................

POSTAGE TO - UK: £2.50  REST OF THE WORLD: £5.20

name: Vintage 70s Fabric Baby Girl Shift Dress Sizes 12m - 3yrs
description:
A beautiful poly-cotton mix girl's shift dress made from 1970's vintage fabrics. Fully lined in white. 3 vintage mother of pearl shell buttons to rear. Hand-made with love by Heiress Apparent. 

LIMITED EDITION OF 20 PIECES. Age 12 months. 
Also available in ages 2 and 3 years.

HEIRESS APPARENT SAYS ... due to the unique nature of this item orientation of the print will be slightly different from that photographed, as each dress is individual and cut from one bolt of vintage fabric. 

KEEP ME LOOKING LOVELY ... handwash or machine wash at 40 degrees. So not bleach. Warm iron. If decorated, iron on reverse. Do not dry clean, Do not tumble dry. Dry inside out to prevent fading where possible.


NOT SURE WHAT SIZE YOU NEED?, see our size guide ...

12 MONTHS - to fit chest 19 3/4 inches / 50 cm. 
Height 31 1/2 inches 80 cm

2 YEARS - to fit chest 20 3/4 inches / 53 cm. 
Height 36 1/4 inches 92 cm

3 YEARS - to fit chest 21 3/4 inches / 55 cm. 
Height 38 1/2 inches 98 cm

name: Vintage Cartoon Fabric Bag Tote Shopper
description:
Vintage Fabric Kids Cartoon 80s Patchwork Bag Tote Shopper 
with Charms by Heiress Apparent

One of a kind hardwearing bright and cheerful patchwork shopper, shoulder bag, tote made from various cotton and poly-cotton patches of 70s and 80s fabric. White webbing handle. Fully lined with pale blue heart and floral fabric. Small interior zipped pocket for mobile, purse etc. Comes with a selection of removable kitsch charms attached to the shoulder strap.  

This particular bag consists of patches of the following fabrics: Power Rangers, Batman, Bananas in Pyjamas, Captain Pugwash, Super Mario, Star Wars,, Budgie, Rupert, Winnie the Pooh, Bambi, Paddington, Thunderbirds, Rainbow Brite, Fraggle Rock, Sonic the Hedgehog, to name but a few.

Dimensions are as follows:
Width: 15 inches (38cm)
Height: 15.5 inches (39)cm)
Handle Length: 26 inches (66cm)


Check out our other funky items from Heiress Apparent, including bags, cushion covers, purses, baby dresses to name but a few. 

I am also available for commissions. Please message me in the first instance.

POSTAGE TO - UK: £3.50    EUROPE & REST OF WORLD: £6.50
